meanings.sent1: From the hill, the lakeview was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: We rented a cabin with a beautiful lakeview.
meanings.sent3: The painting of the lakeview had ducks waterskiing.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a serene lakeview of the world.
meanings.sent5: The lakeview sparkled like a sapphire in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A place or area with a view of a lake.
meanings.sent1: The resort offers a peaceful lakeview for guests.
meanings.sent2: Our picnic spot had a perfect lakeview for watching the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The lakeview restaurant served fish with a side of lakeview.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a tranquil lakeview, reflecting memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The lakeview seemed to stretch endlessly, like a painting come to life.
